Text:
OK this is great, a genuinely funny and informative movie absolutely brilliant way to display 'terrorism' in a movie!
The quality is good even on a 1080 hi def screen. 
Highly recommended.

P.S there is a weird rar. file in this torrent i think it has something to do with subtitles, but  not needed if watching in English so don't bother with it.

Thanks for upload Bone, great quality, however doesnt work streaming to ps3, sound glithes every second for a few seconds, have tried to play with it but no luck. Plays on PC fine just giving everyone heads up.
